slides.title: Be the Go-To Expert

content.headline: When Journalists Need a Quote, They'll Call You

slides.narration: You're already an expert in what you do. The question is: do people know it? When local journalists need a quote, when community members have questions, when someone needs advice—are they calling you? Our expert directory makes sure they are.

slides.title: How It Works

benefits.detail: Writers contact you for quotes and stories
Answer community questions in your area
Verified expert status on your profile
First access to write guest content

slides.narration: Here's how the expert directory works. You're listed as the local expert in your specialty area. Journalists contact you when they need quotes or stories on your topic. You answer community questions in your area of expertise. You get a verified expert badge on your profile. First access to write guest content and articles. And speaking invitations when events need local experts. You're already the expert—this makes it official.

slides.title: Expert Categories
slides.narration: We need experts in many areas. Home and property: real estate, renovation, landscaping. Health and wellness: fitness, nutrition, mental health. Finance and business: accounting, investing, legal. Food and hospitality: restaurants, catering, events. Technology: IT, cybersecurity, digital marketing. Personal services: beauty, auto, childcare, pets. Whatever your specialty, there's likely a spot for you.

slides.title: What We Look For

content.headline: Expert Qualifications

qualifications.requirement: Willing to respond to media inquiries

content.note: We verify credentials before adding experts

slides.narration: What do we look for in experts? Experience: at least three years in your field. Local presence: an active business in our community. Good standing: positive reputation with no major complaints. Availability: willing to respond when journalists or community members reach out. Knowledge sharing mindset: genuinely interested in educating the community. We verify credentials before adding anyone to the directory.

slides.title: Expert Success

examples.impact: Established as the go-to financial voice locally

examples.result: Invited to speak at 3 community events

slides.narration: What do experts experience? A financial planner was quoted in four articles in six months—now established as the go-to financial voice locally. A personal trainer got a monthly Q&A column—gym membership inquiries up thirty-four percent. A real estate agent was invited to speak at three community events—name recognition throughout the community. Expert status opens doors.

slides.title: Apply Now

content.headline: Ready to Be Recognized as an Expert?
content.process: Application takes 5 minutes. Review within 72 hours.

slides.narration: Ready to be recognized as an expert? Apply now—takes about five minutes. We'll review your application within seventy-two hours. Or see our current experts to see the company you'd be joining. You're already the expert. Let's make it official.
